keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Tonkachi First Use
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Tonkachi technique, using the wax stuck to his feet as makeshift hammers to attack Mr. 3.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of this signature Luffy technique, demonstrating his creativity in combat.

keyMoments.title: Breaks Through Candle Wall
keyMoments.description: Using wax hammers, Luffy smashes through Mr. 3's Candle Wall defense, sending the Baroque Works agent flying.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's ability to turn enemy attacks into weapons.

keyMoments.title: Falls Victim to Colors Trap
keyMoments.description: Luffy becomes the victim of Miss Goldenweek's Colors Trap ability, being hypnotized and controlled through painted symbols.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Luffy's vulnerability to psychological attacks due to his simple-minded nature.

keyMoments.title: Tea Party Under Hypnosis
keyMoments.description: Under the spell of Nagomi no Midori, Luffy sits down for a peaceful tea party with Miss Goldenweek instead of fighting to save his friends.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the complete pacifying effect of Colors Trap on even the most determined fighters.

abilities.description: Luffy uses objects stuck to his feet or hands as hammers, swinging them down on opponents with great force.

reveals.information: Simple-minded individuals like Luffy are more vulnerable to psychological attacks such as Colors Trap

name.japanese: ミス・ゴールデンウィーク

keyMoments.title: Colors Trap Revealed
keyMoments.description: Miss Goldenweek reveals her Colors Trap ability, using paint-based symbols to hypnotize and control people's emotions and actions.
keyMoments.significance: First full demonstration of her unique non-Devil Fruit ability, establishing her as a major threat.

keyMoments.title: Uragiri no Kuro Debut
keyMoments.description: Uses Uragiri no Kuro (Black of Betrayal) to make Luffy betray his friends and refuse to help them.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of a specific Colors Trap technique.

keyMoments.title: Warai no Kiiro Debut
keyMoments.description: Uses Warai no Kiiro (Yellow of Laughter) to cause Luffy to burst into uncontrollable laughter.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the emotional manipulation range of Colors Trap.

keyMoments.title: Togyu no Aka Debut
keyMoments.description: Uses Togyu no Aka (Red of Bullfighting) to control Luffy's attack direction like a bull charging at a red cape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates control over physical actions, not just emotions.

keyMoments.title: Kanashimi no Ao Debut
keyMoments.description: Uses Kanashimi no Ao (Blue of Sadness) to make Luffy melancholic and depressed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows ability to induce negative emotions that neutralize Luffy's fighting spirit.

keyMoments.title: Nagomi no Midori Debut
keyMoments.description: Combines yellow and blue paints to create Nagomi no Midori (Green of Soothing), causing Luffy to become peaceful and relaxed.
keyMoments.significance: Shows she can combine different Colors Trap effects for new results.

abilities.description: Paint-based hypnotic ability that uses colored symbols to control emotions and actions. Not a Devil Fruit power.
Black of Betrayal - causes the target to betray their friends and do the opposite of what they say.
Yellow of Laughter - induces uncontrollable laughter in the target.
Red of Bullfighting - directs all of the target's attacks toward the painted mark.
Blue of Sadness - makes the target melancholic and depressed.
Green of Soothing - a blue-yellow mixture causing the target to become peaceful and have a picnic.

reveals.information: Colors Trap is not a Devil Fruit ability but based on color psychology and hypnosis
Strong-minded individuals may be able to resist Colors Trap better than simple-minded people

keyMoments.title: Fights Alone Against Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine
keyMoments.description: With Luffy incapacitated, Usopp must face Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine alone to protect Karoo and buy time, despite being terrified and outmatched.
keyMoments.significance: Important character development showing Usopp stepping up when his crew needs him most.

reveals.information: Shows growing courage and willingness to fight dangerous enemies alone when necessary

keyMoments.title: Battles Luffy with Wax Abilities
keyMoments.description: Continues his battle with Luffy, trapping Luffy's feet in wax, which Luffy then uses against him as hammers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the vulnerability of Mr. 3's strategy when opponents adapt his own weapons.

keyMoments.title: Candle Wall Destroyed
keyMoments.description: Mr. 3's Candle Wall defense is broken through by Luffy's wax hammer attack, sending him flying.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that his wax defenses can be overcome with enough force.

abilities.description: Creates a wall of hardened wax for defense.

keyMoments.title: Nearly Fully Encased in Wax
keyMoments.description: Zoro is nearly completely covered by Mr. 3's wax trap, helpless and unable to escape on his own.
keyMoments.significance: Shows that even strong fighters like Zoro can be completely neutralized by certain Devil Fruit abilities.

keyMoments.title: Nearly Fully Encased in Wax
keyMoments.description: Nami is nearly completely covered by Mr. 3's wax trap, helpless and unable to escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the dire situation and raises the stakes for the rescue attempt.

keyMoments.title: Nearly Fully Encased in Wax
keyMoments.description: Vivi is nearly completely covered by Mr. 3's wax trap, helpless and facing imminent death.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the vulnerability of the princess and the crew's responsibility to protect her.

keyMoments.title: Pursues Usopp and Karoo
keyMoments.description: Chases and attacks Usopp and Karoo while Luffy is incapacitated.
keyMoments.significance: Continues his role as persistent antagonist in the Little Garden arc.

keyMoments.title: Nose Fancy Double Cannon
keyMoments.description: Demonstrates his Nose Fancy Double Cannon technique, firing explosive boogers from both nostrils simultaneously.
keyMoments.significance: Shows escalation of his explosive attack capabilities.

abilities.description: Fires explosive boogers from both nostrils simultaneously for a more powerful attack.

keyMoments.title: Pursues Usopp and Karoo
keyMoments.description: Chases and attacks Usopp and Karoo alongside Mr. 5 while Luffy is incapacitated.
keyMoments.significance: Continues her partnership with Mr. 5 as antagonists.
